title: Before the Internet
description: Technological advances have changed the world around us in many ways, including how we conduct research and communicate. Before the Internet invites students to consider how they would complete a research assignment without the aid of the Internet. Newspapers, card catalogs, phone books, and maps are only some of the resources introduced to students in this thought-provoking text. The book can also be used to identify main idea and supporting details.
meta: contacting, festival, information, interview, research, resources, sources, technology, topics
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Synonyms and Antonyms : Identify synonyms and antonyms

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
